channel.title: Error on SRL Setup
channel.description: Hello, Got to the "Must Needs" thread and SRL was first thing there. Went to download it and I Followed EVERY instruction given. Gave me the "cannot find C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\SRL/SRL.scar" or somethng similar. I think its because when i extracted it INTO the SRL folder I made it then made another SRL folder inside the one i made, and i dont know how to get rid of this. If someone can help, thanks!

item.title: Error on SRL Setup
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

Delete the folder you have called C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\SRL.
Get the SRL installation .exe and run it in the folder C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03. This will place it inside of the includes folder and it will work correctly then if you {.include SRL\SRL.scar}

Read full topic

item.title: Error on SRL Setup
item.dc:creator: @Run_From_Aut Run From Aut
item.description:
@Run_From_Aut wrote:

Hello,
Got to the “Must Needs” thread and SRL was first thing there. Went to download it and I Followed EVERY instruction given. Gave me the “cannot find C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\SRL/SRL.scar” or somethng similar. I think its because when i extracted it INTO the SRL folder I made it then made another SRL folder inside the one i made, and i dont know how to get rid of this. If someone can help, thanks!

Read full topic
